title: Account not Working?
body: I got a notification in the current LOL client that I had been approved for Pre Release testing, so I downloaded the client but when I log in it says my account  doesn't have access to the alpha client test? Did I get the alert by mistake? Or did a rito staff member approve me and I just cant use it yet? I would love to test it out but now I am sorta disappointed that i cant log on and check it out  {{item:3070}}

replies.body: Now the alert has disappeared....I AM SO CONFUSED

> [{quoted}](name=Sands Of Time,realm=OCE,application-id=PpTM71nT,discussion-id=MqYyvJEB,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-09-05T03:28:19.146+0000)
>
> Now the alert has disappeared....I AM SO CONFUSED

The notification in the Legacy client should only come up once after you have dismissed the message.

If you want to download the client again, click [here](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/client-update/download).

> [{quoted}](name=Sands Of Time,realm=OCE,application-id=PpTM71nT,discussion-id=MqYyvJEB,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-09-05T03:05:33.283+0000)
>
> I got a notification in the current LOL client that I had been approved for Pre Release testing, so I downloaded the client but when I log in it says my account  doesn't have access to the alpha client test? Did I get the alert by mistake? Or did a rito staff member approve me and I just cant use it yet? I would love to test it out but now I am sorta disappointed that i cant log on and check it out  {{item:3070}}

Try checking [here](https://account.leagueoflegends.com/oce/en/protect)) or in your email, to see if your League Client Update status is Active. If it says Active and you still can't login on the Alpha client, try submitting a ticket [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with the screenshot attached.

Check out the Alpha Client FAQ regarding the login problem [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/206201070#h3q8), and the Login Issues page [here](https://riotgames.zendesk.com/hc/articles/201761944-Login-Issues) before submitting any tickets.

Good luck!

{{champion:17}}
